archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0298
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a product manager, I want to be able to offer customers wireless broadband while they wait for their fixed broadband services to be connected. (instant broadband).

properties.value: a SIM is embedded in the modem, so this should work automatically and switch from wireless to fixed when available. Details need to be cleared up (both business needs and architecture discussion how to achieve this)

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
